attributes.action: Extra bank holiday after coronavirus lockdown
attributes.additional_details: This is in order to celebrate a stressful time and the biggest change in UK history. This bank holiday will enable the UK to celebrate freedom and every year be reminded of what troubles we faced as a country
attributes.background: An extra bank holiday after coronavirus UK lock down to help celebrate and a reminder every year of the pandemic.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304513

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
